sentences.en: A generous miser is a contradiction in terms.
sentences.cn: “慷慨的吝啬鬼”是一种语词矛盾的说法.

sentences.en: A miser liver poorly in order to save money and keep it.
sentences.cn: 吝惜鬼生活很差,只是为了省下钱存起来.

sentences.en: A miser lusts after [ for ] gold.
As good beg of a naked man as a miser.
sentences.cn: [谚]向守财奴求助,好比向一无所有的人求助.

sentences.en: Fear that someone might steal his money obsessed the old miser.
sentences.cn: 怕有人会偷钱的恐惧困扰着这个老吝啬鬼.

sentences.en: It is the unintellectual miser who sweats blood at the loss of a hundred dollars.
sentences.cn: 只有无知的守财奴才会为损失了100块钱而心痛万分.

sentences.en: Miser: A person who lives poor so that he can die rich.
sentences.cn: 吝啬鬼: 过穷日子以求死后富有的人.

sentences.en: That wizened and grotesque little old man is a notorious miser.
sentences.cn: 那个干瘪难看的小老头是个臭名远扬的吝啬鬼.

sentences.en: The miser doesn't like to part with his money.
sentences.cn: 守财奴舍不得花他的钱.

sentences.en: The miser was an incarnation of greed.
sentences.cn: 那个守财奴是贪婪的化身.

sentences.en: The miser was puffed as a philanthropist.
sentences.cn: 那个守财奴被说成是个慈善家.

sentences.en: The miser was untouched by the poor man's story.
sentences.cn: 那个吝啬鬼对那穷人的叙述无动于衷.

sentences.en: The old miser devised all of her property to her only child.
sentences.cn: 老守财奴把自己的所有财产都留给了她唯一的孩子.

sentences.en: Wish a miser long life, and you wish him no good.
sentences.cn: 祝守财奴长寿, 对他并无好处.

trans.tran_cn: 守财奴，吝啬鬼，〈古〉可怜的人，（矿山，凿井用）钻孔机，凿井机，[矿]管形提泥钻头
trans.tran_en: someone who is not generous and does not like spending money
